DOC.brief_summary: Bilateral evaluation of unilateral implantation of ReSTOR and contralateral monofocal or phakic eye.
DOC.brief_title: Contralateral ReSTOR / Monofocal or Phakic Eye
DOC.criteria: Unilateral operable cataract Candidate for presbyopic intraocular lens (IOL) Ocular comorbidities compromising primary outcome Bilateral cataracts
